title: Turned round to see
creator_credit: Franciscan Communications Center, Karl Holtsnider and Nicholas Frangakis
brief_description: A dramatisation about the experiences of a lonely and puzzled 17-year-old boy who wanders into a teenage discotheque. Expresses the need for self knowledge and that such self knowledge leads an individual to reach out to others.
creator_credit_for_label: Franciscan Communications Center, Karl Holtsnider and Nicholas Frangakis
